topics.title: Can traffic be encrypted in ZeroNet now?
topics.body: Can traffic be encrypted in ZeroNet now? If can't, please  offer traffic encryption  option.  It's necessary in CHINA because of the Great FireWall which has Deep Packet Inspection. If traffic contains sensitive content, nodes may be blocked. And traffic without encryption results in privacy problem. I think traffic encryption can be easily implemented since you can refer the code of  shadowsocks ( https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks ), a popular Python tool to bypass  the Great FireWall in China. THX!

topics.title: idea of ZeroSocial -- timeline view of ZeroHello
topics.body: ZeroSocial ( whatever it is named) is like a timeline view of ZeroHello, since seeding a site is like following a site. If the site we followed is a blog and has a new post, the new post will be at the top  of the timeline, just like G+/facebook/twitter. And we can comment or retweet posts in the timeline, fo or unfo a site.

> [bts](#comment_2_121): 貌似用的websocket同web server交互，但是用户数据怎么发到所有人的呢？

在ZeroTalk里，web server交互，分为远程的和本地的web server。远程的web server是site owner的，只用于注册（所以目前注册是中心化的）。等site owner把你的注册信息（用户名、公钥）写到网站文件夹里并同步到其他节点，你就能直接发贴到P2P网络，不需要经过site owner。本地的web server相当于后端，负责P2P传输并同浏览器前端交互。
我之前提建议，能不能把注册去中心化，像Twister一样。或许可以不用PoW而用PoS

> [bts](#comment_4_121): 恩，昨天花了点时间看了下，小数据量是可以这样搞，不过还是需要site owner授权这一步。如果大数据量的话，还是需要类似twister的技术，简单说不能把所有的数据都弄下来才能访问，必须把数据分散保存并且有一定的检索能力才行。

如果大数据量的话，类似twister的才有问题。因为spam数据可能会占满用户硬盘。而ZN是有选择地下载数据，垃圾站的数据自然没有人去下载。twister本身的检索能力也不行，这是P2P的通病
